description:
For crisp early starts and late summer with a touch of fall in the air, this long sleeve jersey cuts the chill, so you focus on your ride and not your goosebumps.

  • Quick drying fabric actively moves moisture away from your skin, so you stay dry and cool
  • Full-length YKK® zipper makes it easy to fine tune your venting
  • Long inset sleeves don’t ride up
  • 3 rear pockets for a light jacket, some tools and gels
  • Gripper elastic at the back keeps the jersey in place
name: Castelli Cadence Long Sleeve Jersey - Men's
